name: 王伯雅
objective: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
schedule:
Week 1: Course introduction and policy 
Week 2: Introduction to Business Communication 
Week 3: Talking on the Telephone
Week 4: Talking on the Telephone
Week 5: Interview
Week 6: Interview
Week 7:  Making Arrangements and Appointments
Week 8: English for Socializing
Week 9: Midterm 
Week 10: English for Socializing
Week 11: English for Socializing
Week 12: Running a Meeting 
Week 13: Running a Meeting
Week 14: Making a Speech and Presentation
Week 15: Making a Speech and Presentation
Week 16: Making a Speech and Presentation 
Week 17: Final Presentation Discussion
Week 18 Final Presentation
Week 19 Final exam
